Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Traits.Name: Legion
Traits.Description: Up to two foes with Legion can take their turns at the same time.
Traits.DescriptionNonessential: A foe with this trait has reduced stats but costs half the encounter points.

Traits.Name: Ethereal
Traits.Description: Has phasing and resistance unless there's an adjacent foe.

Traits.Name: Eternal Rage
Traits.Description: When defeated, instead become intangible until the end of their next turn. At the end of that turn, become defeated.

Actions.Name: Shock
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is shattered.

Actions.Name: Chain Lightning
Actions.AreaEffect: A foe in range 3 from the attack target must save or take [D]. If they fail the save, this effect repeats, choosing a new foe in range 3 of them instead. A character can be hit multiple times by this effect and it can 'bounce' back and forth.
